info.name: TaskManagementSystem
info.description: API Documentation for TaskManagementSystem backend services. Using Express.js and MySQL.

request.description:
# LOGIN an Account

## Method: POST

## URL

> [http://localhost:3000](https://rent-note.vercel.app) 
  

## Request Example

> POST [http://localhost:3000/api/v1/auth/login](http://localhost:3000/api/v1/task) 
  

## Parameter(resource)

1. task: check task data
    

## Response

- Success Response(200)
    

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Success Login",
    "data": {
        "token": "your token",
        "name": "Your Name"
    }
}

 ```

- Error Response(500)
    

``` json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Internal Server Error" || "Something went wrong"

 ```

- Error Response(401 Unauthorized)
    

``` json
{
    "success": false,
    "message": "Email not found"
}

 ```

``` json
{
    "success": false,
    "message": "Please input a Password"
}

 ```

``` json
{
    "success": false,
    "message": "Password don't match"
}

 ```

# LOGOUT an Account

## Method: POST

## URL

> [http://localhost:3000](https://rent-note.vercel.app) 
  

## Request Example

> POST [http://localhost:3000/api/v1/auth/logout](http://localhost:3000/api/v1/task) 
  

## Parameter(resource)

1. task: check task data
    

## Response

- Success Response(200)
    

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Success Logout",
    "data": {
        "message": "Logout Success"
    }
}

 ```

- Error Response(500)
    

``` json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Internal Server Error" || "Something went wrong"

 ```

# GET All Task

## Method: GET

## URL

> [http://localhost:3000](https://rent-note.vercel.app) 
  

## Headers:

- Authorization: Bearer
    
- Content-Type: application/json
    

## Request Example

> GET [http://localhost:3000/api/v1/task](http://localhost:3000/api/v1/task) 
  

## Parameter(resource)

1. task: check task data
    

## Response

- Success Response(200)
    

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Success get data with user id: 2",
    "data": [
        {
            "task_id": 22,
            "title": "Mengecek Gudang",
            "description": "Mengecek Gudang A",
            "status": "In Progress",
            "deadline": "2025-10-31T02:06:00.000Z"
        }
    ]
}

 ```

- Error Response(500)
    

``` json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Internal Server Error" || "Something went wrong"
}

 ```

- Error Response(404)
    

``` json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Data not found"
}

 ```

# GET All Task

## Method: GET

## URL

> [http://localhost:3000](https://rent-note.vercel.app) 
  

## Headers:

- Authorization: Bearer
    
- Content-Type: application/json
    

## Request Example

> GET [http://localhost:3000/api/v1/task/:id](http://localhost:3000/api/v1/task) 
  

## Parameter(resource)

1. task: check task data
    

## Response

- Success Response(200)
    

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Success get data with user_id: 2 and task_id: 22",
    "data": {
        "task_id": 22,
        "title": "Mengecek Gudang",
        "description": "Mengecek Gudang",
        "status": "In Progress",
        "deadline": "2025-10-31T02:06:00.000Z"
    }
}

 ```

- Error Response(404)
    

``` json
 {
  "success": false,
  "message": "User ID: 68cb94c83b8c62f2f5f88c36 not found"
}

 ```

- Error Response(500)
    

``` json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Internal Server Error" || "Something went wrong"
}

 ```

- Error Response(404)
    

``` json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Data not found"
}

 ```

# ADD a Single Task

## Method: POST

## URL

> [http://localhost:3000](https://rent-note.vercel.app) 
  

## Headers:

- Authorization: Bearer
    
- Content-Type: application/json
    

## Request Example

> POST [http://localhost:3000/api/v1/task](http://localhost:3000/api/v1/task) 
  

## Parameter(resource)

1. task: check task data
    

## Response

- Success Response(200)
    

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Success insert data with user_id: 2",
    "data": {
        "identifiers": [
            {
                "task_id": 26
            }
        ],
        "generatedMaps": [
            {
                "task_id": 26,
                "status": "To Do"
            }
        ],
        "raw": {
            "fieldCount": 0,
            "affectedRows": 1,
            "insertId": 26,
            "info": "",
            "serverStatus": 2,
            "warningStatus": 0,
            "changedRows": 0
        }
    }
}

 ```

- Error Response(500)
    

``` json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Internal Server Error" || "Something went wrong"
}

 ```

- Error Response(400)
    

``` json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Invalid ID format"
}

 ```

# EDIT a Single Task

## Method: PUT

## URL

> [http://localhost:3000](https://rent-note.vercel.app) 
  

## Headers:

- Authorization: Bearer
    
- Content-Type: application/json
    

## Request Example

> PUT [http://localhost:3000/api/v1/task](http://localhost:3000/api/v1/task)/:id 
  

## Parameter(resource)

1. task: check task data
    

## Response

- Success Response(200)
    

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Success update data with user_id: 2 and task_id: 22",
    "data": {
        "generatedMaps": [],
        "raw": [],
        "affected": 1
    }
}

 ```

- Error Response(500)
    

``` json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Internal Server Error" || "Something went wrong"
}

 ```

Error Response(400)

``` json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Invalid ID format"
}

 ```

# DELETE a Single Task

## Method: DELETE

## URL

> [http://localhost:3000](https://rent-note.vercel.app) 
  

## Headers:

- Authorization: Bearer
    
- Content-Type: application/json
    

## Request Example

> DELETE [http://localhost:3000/api/v1/task](http://localhost:3000/api/v1/task)/:id 
  

## Parameter(resource)

1. task: check task data
    

## Response

- Success Response(200)
    

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Success delete data with user_id: 2 and task_id: 22",
    "data": {
        "raw": [],
        "affected": 1
    }
}

 ```

- Error Response(500)
    

``` json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Internal Server Error" || "Something went wrong"
}

 ```

- Error Response(400)
    

``` json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Invalid ID format"
}

 ```
